name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple New Tab ✨: Customizable, Pastel Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalistic new tab with random pastel tab with noise, clock, custom google font, performance settings, and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our straightforward Chrome extension designed to enhance your new tab experience – the Digital Clock Display. Easily stay on top of the time with a customizable digital clock right in your Chrome tab.

Brief:
- Noise: None/ Low/ High
- Themes: Light/ Dark
- 500+ Font Families from Google Fonts
- Sync across Chrome Profiles
- Clocks: None/ 12hr/ 24hr
- Variable Refresh Rate (for Performance)
- Many more things: tab title, font size

Extensions
- Access Stopwatch through extensions


Key Features:

Font Customization: Choose the font size and family that suits your style. Access a variety of fonts from Google Fonts at fonts.google.com.
Time Format Options: Tailor the clock to your preference with the choice between 12-hour and 24-hour formats.
Milliseconds Display: Toggle the display of milliseconds to refine your timekeeping precision.
Refresh Rate Customization: Adjust the refresh rate to align with your browsing habits and ensure real-time accuracy.
New Tab Name Customization: Personalize your new tab experience by giving it a name that reflects your style and priorities.

Download now to personalize your Chrome tab and effortlessly keep track of time!
